column4: can someone recommend a good graphics benchmarking program, I have a new thinkpad and want to confirm that mesa is running way too slowly
it seems to be from the webgl demos and a few other apps, but i'd like something more solid so i can draft a bug report
phoronix has a testsuite. Theres a version in the repositories, but I've not used it myself: phoronix-test-suite
that's what i've found so far, wasn't sure if that was the best out there but i'll give it a try
